title: The Religion of Alone: Talking to Dead Animals, the Weather, God
description:
I like watching the program Alone on the History Channel. I am fascinated by their behavior towards the animals they kill and eat, the weather, and the rest of the natural environment. What does that say about human religiosity? https://www.history.com/shows/alone

 God is the Ancient solution to the Frame problem https://youtu.be/BqinRbjqy2c 

Gad Saad and David Sloan Wilson https://youtu.be/zXcU6qPcVvE 

Tom Holland Did Religion Exist in the Ancient world https://youtu.be/ZeCTC_r4vMI

 Po the Person What is God? https://youtu.be/fyYkFdof4m0 

Jordan Peterson Resurrection of the Christ https://youtu.be/xPIanlF6IwM 

Steven Smith Pagans and Christians in the City https://youtu.be/W9I9sVUta5s 

Ross Douthat, Tara Isabella Burton Steven D Smith Next Religion https://youtu.be/WIttJNroGyM 

John Vervaeke Narrative https://youtu.be/ov3fSnPMkCo 

John Vervaeke Jonathan Pageau God and Relevance Realization https://youtu.be/N1byG4RqoTg 

Rebel Wisdom Sand Talk https://youtu.be/S-3ESBzGg4Q
